SawyerController.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 """
3 This is a sawyer pose library, this is comprised of three main types of classes
4 1) General Utilities: defs utilized by all classes
5 2) Static Defs: All defs starting with static.
6  Used only for static data collection
7 3) dynamic Defs: All defs starting with dynamic.
8  Used for dynamic data collection only
9 Each Pose should be defined in this way
10 poses_list = [
11  [[-1, -pi / 3, -pi / 4, 1, 1, 1, -pi / 4], [0, 0, 0.5, 0, 0, 0, 0], 'Pose_1'],
12  [[-0.5, -pi / 3, -pi / 4, 1, 1, 1, -pi / 4], [0, 0, -0.5, 0, 0, 0, 0], 'Pose_2']
13  ]
14 Which is basically:
15 poses_list = [
16  [[Position List_1], [Velocity_list_1], 'Pose_name_1'],
17  [[Position List_2], [Velocity_list_2], 'Pose_name_2']
18  ]
19 """
20 import rospy
21 from math import pi
22 import numpy as np
23 
24 import intera_interface
25 
26 
27 class SawyerController(object):
28  """
29  This is the main SawyerPose class.
30  The main reason this class needs to be overridden is
31  that you can rospy.init_node
32  once. Hence. You need to call this super method.
33  """
34 
35  def __init__(self, limb="right"):
36  """
37  SawyerController class. Currently tested in simulation.
38 
39  Arguments
40  ---------
41  `limb`: `str`
42  The limb string used to initialize
43  `self._limb.`
44 
45  """
46  # Create Publishers and Init Node
47  rospy.init_node('sawyer_controller', anonymous=True)
48  # Set Initial position of the robot
49  self._limb = intera_interface.Limb(limb)
50  self._rs = intera_interface.RobotEnable(intera_interface.CHECK_VERSION)
51  self._init_state = self._rs.state().enabled
52  self._rs.enable()
53 
54  self.positions = {name: 0.0 for name in self._limb.joint_names()}
55  self.velocities = {name: 0.0 for name in self._limb.joint_names()}
56 
57  try:
58  self._limb.set_joint_positions(self.positions)
59  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
60  print('Set Joint Velocities Failed')
61 
62  self.sleep_time_static = rospy.get_param('/static_sleep_time')
63  self.r = rospy.Rate(rospy.get_param('/dynamic_frequency'))
64  self.pose_name = ''
65 
66  @property
67  def joint_names(self):
68  """
69  Gets the joint names of the Sawyer robot.
70  """
71  return self._limb.joint_names()
72 
73  @property
74  def joint_angles(self):
75  """
76  Gets the current joint angles of the Sawyer robot.
77  """
78  return self._limb.joint_angles()
79 
80  @property
81  def joint_velocities(self):
82  """
83  Gets the current joint velocities of the Sawyer robot.
84  """
85  return self._limb.joint_velocities()
86 
87  def joint_angle(self, joint_name):
88  """
89  Gets the joint angle for the Sawyer's
90  corresponding joint name.
91 
92  Arguments
93  ---------
94  `joint_name`: `str`
95  The name of the joint on the Panda.
96 
97  """
98  return self._limb.joint_angle(joint_name)
99 
100  def joint_velocity(self, joint_name):
101  """
102  Gets the joint velocity for the Sawyer's
103  corresponding joint name.
104 
105  Arguments
106  ---------
107  `joint_name`: `str`
108  The name of the joint on the Panda.
109 
110  """
111  return self._limb.joint_velocity(joint_name)
112 
113  def set_joint_position_speed(self, speed=1.0):
114  """
115  Sets the joint position speed for Sawyer.
116 
117  Arguments
118  ---------
119  `speed`: `float`
120  The speed in rad/s of the joints.
121 
122  """
123  return self._limb.set_joint_position_speed(speed=speed)
124 
125  def publish_positions(self, positions, sleep):
126  """
127  Set joint positions of the sawyer
128 
129  Arguments
130  ----------
131  positions: list
132  Set the joint positions according to the list that you get
133  sleep: float
134  Set how long it should wait after commanding a command
135 
136  Returns
137  ----------
138  return: None
139  """
140  if len(positions) != 7:
141  raise Exception("The length of input list should be 7, as sawyer has 7 joints.")
142 
143  for joint_name, position in zip(self._limb.joint_names(), positions):
144  self.positions[joint_name] = position
145 
146  if not rospy.is_shutdown():
147  try:
148  self._limb.move_to_joint_positions(self.positions, timeout=sleep)
149  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
150  print('Set Joint Positions Failed')
151 
152  if sleep:
153  rospy.sleep(self.sleep_time_static)
154  else:
155  self.r.sleep()
156 
157  def publish_velocities(self, velocities, sleep=None):
158  """
159  Set joint velocities of the sawyer
160 
161  Arguments
162  ----------
163  positions: list
164  Set the joint velocities according to the list that you get
165  sleep: float
166  Set how long it should wait after commanding a command
167 
168  Returns
169  ----------
170  return: None
171  """
172  if len(velocities) != 7:
173  raise Exception("The length of input list should be 7, as sawyer has 7 arms")
174 
175  for joint_name, velocity in zip(self._limb.joint_names(), velocities):
176  self.velocities[joint_name] = velocity
177 
178  if not rospy.is_shutdown():
179  try:
180  self._limb.set_joint_velocities(self.velocities)
181  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
182  print('Set Joint Velocities Failed')
183 
184  if sleep:
185  rospy.sleep(self.sleep_time_static)
186  else:
187  self.r.sleep()
188 
189  def publish_trajectory(self, positions, velocities, accelerations, sleep):
190  """
191  Set joint trajectory (positions and velocities) of the sawyer
192 
193  Arguments
194  ----------
195  positions: list
196  Set the joint positions according to the list that you get
197  velocities: list
198  Set the joint velocities according to the list that you get
199  sleep: float
200  Set how long it should wait after commanding a command
201 
202  Returns
203  ----------
204  return: None
205  """
206  if len(positions) != 7:
207  raise Exception("The length of input list should be 7, as sawyer has 7 joints")
208  if len(velocities) != 7:
209  raise Exception("The length of input list should be 7, as sawyer has 7 joints")
210 
211  for joint_name, position, velocity in zip(self._limb.joint_names(), positions, velocities):
212  self.positions[joint_name] = position
213  self.velocities[joint_name] = velocity
214 
215  if not rospy.is_shutdown():
216  try:
217  self._limb.set_joint_trajectory(self._limb.joint_names(), positions, velocities, accelerations)
218  except rospy.ROSInternalException:
219  print('Set Joint Trajectory Failed')
220 
221  if sleep:
222  rospy.sleep(self.sleep_time_static)
223  else:
224  self.r.sleep()
225 
226  # End General Utilities
227  def set_positions_list(self, poses, sleep):
228  """
229  Set joint poses (positions)
230 
231  Arguments
232  ----------
233  poses: Special Data Structure
234  Loop through all the positions and velocities in the poses
235  poses = [pose, pose, ..., pose]
236  pose = [positions, velocities, string]
237  sleep: float
238  Set how long it should wait after commanding a command
239 
240  Returns
241  --------
242  return: None
243  """
244  for pose in poses:
245  positions, _, pose_name = pose[0], pose[1], pose[2] # noqa: F841
246  self.pose_name = pose_name
247  self.publish_positions(positions, sleep)
248 
249  def set_velocities_list(self, poses, sleep=None):
250  """
251  Set poses (velocities)
252 
253  Arguments
254  ----------
255  poses: Special Data Structure
256  Loop through all the positions and velocities in the poses
257  poses = [pose, pose, ..., pose]
258  pose = [positions, velocities, string]
259  sleep: float
260  Set how long it should wait after commanding a command
261 
262  Returns
263  --------
264  return: None
265  """
266  for each_pose in poses:
267  _, velocities, pose_name = each_pose[0], each_pose[1], each_pose[2] # noqa: F841
268  self.pose_name = pose_name
269  self.publish_velocities(velocities, sleep)
270 
271  def set_trajectory_list(self, poses, sleep=None):
272  """
273  Set poses (positions and velocities)
274 
275  Arguments
276  ----------
277  poses: Special Data Structure
278  Loop through all the positions and velocities in the poses
279  poses = [pose, pose, ..., pose]
280  pose = [positions, velocities, string]
281  sleep: float
282  Set how long it should wait after commanding a command
283 
284  Returns
285  --------
286  return: None
287  """
288  # TODO: add accelerations
289  for each_pose in poses:
290  positions, velocities, pose_name = each_pose[0], each_pose[1], each_pose[2]
291  accelerations = np.zeros(7)
292  self.pose_name = pose_name
293  self.publish_trajectory(positions, velocities, accelerations, sleep)
294 
295 
296 if __name__ == "__main__":
297  poses_list = [
298  [[-1, -pi / 3, -pi / 4, 1, 1, 1, -pi / 4], [0, 0, 0.5, 0, 0, 0, 0], 'Pose_1'],
299  [[-0.5, -pi / 3, -pi / 4, 1, 1, 1, -pi / 4], [0, 0, -0.5, 0, 0, 0, 0], 'Pose_2']
300  ]
301  controller = SawyerController()
302  controller.publish_positions([0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0], 5)
